text: The Palace of Kangla () was the earliest known fortified capital city of Ancient Manipur. It served as the seat of administration of the rulers of many dynasties, right from the reign of Emperor Tangja Leela Pakhangba in 1445 BC (15th century BC), though significant advanced developments belonged to the post periods of Nongda Lairen Pakhangba (33 AD - 154 AD). ==Layout== ==Gallery== Bir Tikendrajit memorial temple .jpg Kangla 3.jpg Kangla dragons imphal.JPG Kangla Fort Complex, Imphal
